akn:section.akn:heading: Liability regarding emergency use of automated external defibrillators

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Good Samaritan protections regarding AEDs Except as provided in subsection (b), any person who uses or attempts to use an automated external defibrillator device on a victim of a perceived medical emergency is immune from civil liability for any harm resulting from the use or attempted use of such device; and in addition, any person who acquired the device is immune from such liability, if the harm was not due to the failure of such acquirer of the device—
